title: Font - Karuna-Shechen
content:
Hi everybody,

Please does anyone know the name of the font used on this logo ?

Thank you for your help !

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701115504im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Karuna_Shechen_4917.jpg)

The other text is good old "Georgia", by the way.

- Mike Yanega
These are the ones I was looking for. Thank you very much
